definition.text: The Docs is a Space within the Superalgos Project. It allows users to search for information relative to nodes, concepts, topics, tutorials, reviews, and books related to different projects.

paragraphs.text: The Docs is a collection of pages organized in categories, each one saved as a JSON file in the following path:
A directory structure follows, with each folder featuring a Docs Page Category:

> Docs-Books
> Docs-Concepts
> Docs-Nodes
> Docs-Reviews
> Docs-Topics
> Docs-Tutorials
